1712958847.4879694.sceneDescription: A person is taking slices of bread out of a plastic bag and placing them on a wooden surface. The bag suggests the bread is gluten-free and the sequence shows the progression of the person unpacking the bread.

1712958863.189062.sceneDescription: In this segment of a video, two pieces of bread are being spread with a yellow substance from a Nuttelex Original container. The substance appears to be some form of spread, likely a butter or margarine alternative.

1712958877.3715742.sceneDescription: In this sequence of frames, someone is spreading butter on two slices of multi-grain bread on a wooden cutting board. The spreading is done in a methodical manner, covering each slice evenly with butter.

1712958890.254054.sceneDescription: In the given segment of the video, someone is spreading a creamy substance, likely butter or spreadable cheese, evenly onto slices of bread. They start with one slice and then move on to spread the substance on the second slice as well.

1712958904.2627633.sceneDescription: A jar of jam is being opened, and jam is spread on a slice of bread. This segment of the video showcases the process of preparing a slice of bread with jam.

1712958917.0403154.sceneDescription: In these images, someone is preparing toast by spreading butter on two slices of bread and then adding jam to one slice. The process involves opening a jam jar and using a knife to apply the jam onto the bread.

1712958928.2786958.sceneDescription: In this series of frames, someone is spreading jelly or jam on a slice of bread that has been previously spread with butter or a similar spreadable condiment. The person is using a knife to apply and evenly distribute the jam on the bread.

1712958942.2308476.sceneDescription: Two slices of bread are being prepared with spreads; one slice is being spread with what appears to be a creamy white condiment while the other is being spread with red jam. The person is using a knife to apply and spread the condiments evenly over the slices.

1712958955.7724574.sceneDescription: In the segment of the video depicted by these frames, a person is preparing a sandwich by spreading cream cheese on one slice of bread and jelly on the other, then putting the slices together to complete the sandwich. The final frame shows the sandwich fully assembled on the wooden board.

1712958965.4391835.sceneDescription: A person is slicing a piece of bread into four triangular pieces and then placing them onto a plate. The individual cuts the bread first along one diagonal and then along the other, making an X before transferring the slices.

1712958977.2326095.sceneDescription: In this segment of the video, someone is using a plate with a patterned edge to cut a sandwich into four triangular pieces. They are snapping the slices apart and placing them back on the plate.

1712958986.267346.sceneDescription: In this video segment, a person is cutting a sandwich into smaller, triangular pieces and arranging them on a plate. The sandwich is being rotated to efficiently use the space on the plate as the pieces are added.
